skills.name: SEARING FALL
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• 75% Chance to permanently Increase ATK, MAGIC, DEF, and MR for self and permanently Decrease ATK, MAGIC, DEF, and MR of the enemy by 5%.
• Increase Negative Effect Duration on the target by 1 turn if the target is inflicted with a Burn effect.

skills.name: DRAINING SHARD
desc: • Deals 5 hits of physical damage to all enemies.
• Inflict Perfect Crave on all enemies for 1 turn.
• Inflict HP Drain on all enemies for 3 turns.

skills.name: PLAGA INVENTATIS
desc: • After an enemy gains an Extra Turn inflict Stop and Perfect Silence on them for 2 turns.
